title: Type things to do in Europe before and after ATypI Helsinki 2005
content:
Hello everyone!

Myself and two other brazilian typophiles are planning our trip to Helsinki, and since we’ll be quite far from home, we plan on staying more than just the conference days. Does anyone have any recommendations on type-related [or any other interesting] events that will happen in Europe close to ATypI? Conferences, workshops, exhibitions? I know “Europe” is a bit vague, but once you’ve crossed the Atlantic, a few more miles are no problem. ;)
author: gabrielhl

comments.content:
Gabriel,

Helsinki is so beautiful I suspect you should take of advantage of location. I would go see the Ramsay stones.

Gerald Giampa

Gerald, we sure will, but we plan on staying in Europe around one month before returning home. So we were thinking of traveling a little, since we can only have trips like that once every few years, because of distance and money.

Oh and by the way, your work is fantastic, I’m a fan :)
